entries.title: 20 June - weekly maintenance, release v0.163.0

content.value:
Jun 20, 15:40 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 20, 14:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 19, 16:39 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance - release v0.163.0 - on Tuesday, 20 June from 1400 to 1600 UTC. Our members may experience delays in deposit system admin tool (doi.crossref.org) processing. Deposits submitted during this time will be stored and processed after the maintenance has been completed.

entries.title: Delays with submission processing at doi.crossref.org

title_detail.value: Delays with submission processing at doi.crossref.org

content.value:
Jun 13, 21:33 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 6, 16:27 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 6, 15:46 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 6, 07:15 UTC
Update - We continue to see problems with content registration. We are still receiving content registration requests but they are not being processed. Our team is looking into the problem and we'll update as soon as we have more news.

Jun 5, 07:26 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 2, 22:54 UTC
Update - Content registration to doi.crossref.org is currently delayed. We're processing submissions but currently have a reduced number of threads within the submission queue for that processing. Submissions through Metadata Manager are returning 500 status error messages, so are unable to be processed at this time. For urgent Metadata Manager registrations, consider using the web deposit form: https://apps.crossref.org/webDeposit/. We do not anticipate a full resolution of this incident until Monday, 5 June.

Jun 2, 22:49 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 2, 22:11 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entries.summary:

entries.title: Submission logs not being emailed for registrations to our admin tool - doi.crossref.org

title_detail.value: Submission logs not being emailed for registrations to our admin tool - doi.crossref.org

content.value:
Jun 5, 07:27 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 2, 14:36 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 1, 17:14 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue. We do not expect to resolve this issue until tomorrow. Unfortunately, email notifications of your submissions logs will continue to be delayed.

In the interim, we are still processing submissions and you can confirm any past registrations in our admin tool using these instructions: https://www.crossref.org/documentation/register-maintain-records/verify-your-registration/submission-queue-and-log/#00143

Jun 1, 16:09 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 1, 15:21 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 1, 13:46 UTC
Investigating - We have had several members report that they are not receiving submission logs via email for their registrations. We have been able to replicate the issue and are investigating it further. In the interim, we are still processing those submissions and you can confirm any past registrations in our admin tool using these instructions: https://www.crossref.org/documentation/register-maintain-records/verify-your-registration/submission-queue-and-log/#00143

entries.title: 31 May - special maintenance, release v0.162.0

content.value:
May 31, 18:20 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 31, 17:02 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 31, 15:39 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing unplanned maintenance - release v0.162.0 - today, 31 May from 1700 to 1900 UTC as a follow-on to the incident we had earlier today - https://status.crossref.org/incidents/pnq1r662cvmr. Our members may experience delays in deposit system admin tool (doi.crossref.org) processing. Deposits submitted during this time will be stored and processed after the special maintenance has been completed.

entries.title: Submissions failing with connection timeout

content.value:
May 16, 21:12 UTC
Resolved - This incident - an issue with one of the handle servers - has been resolved. Members who received a connection time out failure in their submission logs between 15:42 and 17:06 UTC should resubmit their deposits to us so we can reprocess those failures.

May 16, 18:17 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

May 16, 17:12 UTC
Investigating - We're seeing a number of failed submissions in doi.crossref.org with error messages like this: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: connect timed out. We've suspended submission processing in the admin tool submission queue to investigate. You may continue sending us submissions at this time, but submission processing has been paused.

entries.summary:
May 16, 21:12 UTC
Resolved - This incident - an issue with one of the handle servers - has been resolved. Members who received a connection time out failure in their submission logs between 15:42 and 17:06 UTC should resubmit their deposits to us so we can reprocess those failures.

May 16, 18:17 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Investigating - We're seeing a number of failed submissions in doi.crossref.org with error messages like this: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: connect timed out. We've suspended submission processing in the admin tool submission queue to investigate. You may continue sending us submissions at this time, but submission processing has been paused.

entries.title: Submission logs not being emailed for registrations to our admin tool - doi.crossref.org

title_detail.value: Submission logs not being emailed for registrations to our admin tool - doi.crossref.org

content.value:
May 16, 16:12 UTC
Resolved - Many of the emails containing submission logs for our members' registrations bounced yesterday and early today. We have resolved the immediate crisis and email notifications are again being sent and delivered.

Unfortunately, we don't have a mechanism for resending those bounced emails. Members who have been awaiting emails containing their submission logs for registrations made yesterday or today should access our admin tool to review those submission logs using these instructions: https://www.crossref.org/documentation/register-maintain-records/verify-your-registration/submission-queue-and-log/#00143

May 16, 14:30 UTC
Investigating - We have had several members report that they are not receiving submission logs via email for their registrations. We have been able to replicate the issue and are investigating it further. In the interim, we are still processing those submissions and you can confirm any past registrations in our admin tool using these instructions: https://www.crossref.org/documentation/register-maintain-records/verify-your-registration/submission-queue-and-log/#00143

entries.summary:
May 16, 16:12 UTC
Resolved - Many of the emails containing submission logs for our members' registrations bounced yesterday and early today. We have resolved the immediate crisis and email notifications are again being sent and delivered.

Unfortunately, we don't have a mechanism for resending those bounced emails. Members who have been awaiting emails containing their submission logs for registrations made yesterday or today should access our admin tool to review those submission logs using these instructions: https://www.crossref.org/documentation/register-maintain-records/verify-your-registration/submission-queue-and-log/#00143

entries.title: Regenerating XML Metadata Plus Snapshots - March and April 2023

title_detail.value: Regenerating XML Metadata Plus Snapshots - March and April 2023

content.value:
May 11, 17:54 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 10, 13:03 UTC
Investigating - There was an issue with the generation of March and April's XML Metadata Plus snapshots. As a result, we are rebuilding those. We expect to have both available later this week and will update this message when they are posted.

entries.summary:
May 11, 17:54 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 10, 13:03 UTC
Investigating - There was an issue with the generation of March and April's XML Metadata Plus snapshots. As a result, we are rebuilding those. We expect to have both available later this week and will update this message when they are posted.

content.value:

Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Investigating - We're observing problems with our web deposit form - https://apps.crossref.org/webDeposit/ - at the moment. Loading times are slow and some users are reporting problems accessing the web deposit form. We're investigating.
